original_text: Then he took the Book of the Covenant and read it to the people. They responded, “We will do everything the Lord has said; we will obey.”
korean_text: 언약서를 가져다가 백성에게 낭독하여 듣게 하니 그들이 이르되 여호와의 모든 말씀을 우리가 준행하리이다

sentences.original_text: Then he took the Book of the Covenant
and read it to the people
We will do everything the Lord has said
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 주님께서 말씀하신 모든 것을 행하겠습니다
